name: MathDrills
0:
”Alexa start math drills”
”Set subject to multiplication”
”Set mode to easy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: math drills
des:
Math Drills - Practice Multiplication, Addition, Subtraction and Division Problems

To play: 
 Alexa open Math Drills

When open you can configure as follows:
 Ask <2-30> questions
 Change subject to [multiplication|addition|subtraction|division]
 Change mode to [easy|medium|hard|loco]
 Change questions to <2-100>
 Set subject to [multiplication|addition|subtraction|division]
 Set mode to [easy|medium|hard|loco]

At any point you can ask alexa to:
'repeat'
'skip'
'reset'
'details' or 'info'

To configure from outside the app:
 Alexa ask Math Drills to set subject to [multiplication|addition|subtraction|division]
 Alexa ask Math Drills to set mode to [easy|medium|hard|loco]
 Alexa ask Math Drills to set questions to <2-30> Default: 10

Advanced subjects that the app supports:
* Halves
* Doubles
* Missing Addition
* Missing Subtraction
* Missing Multiplication
* Missing Division
* Squares
* Square roots
* Cubes
* Cube roots
* Add three numbers
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
